Reviews.Title: Very bad picture quality
Reviews.Author: Richard Williams
Reviews.Content: Tried using this for security camera conversion to use a TV as a monitor. Could not get the picture to be even a little usable. If you want any detail in picture quality I would not recommend this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
Use TV as PC monitor to view presentations, games, pictures, and movies or to browse the Web
Connects your DVR with VGA output to existing TV or CRT monitor
Ideal for notebook computer users to easily connect and use a large-format monitor
Windows and Mac compatible
Simple and quick to install
ProductInfo.Name: Comelit USA VGA to BNC Converter
